thread.section_title: News Article Archive from M03 22, 2018 - Wsj.com
thread.title: John Dowd to Leave as Trump’s Top Lawyer in Russia Probe

author: Rebecca Ballhaus
title: John Dowd to Leave as Trump’s Top Lawyer in Russia Probe
text:
The lead lawyer representing President Donald Trump in the special counsel’s Russia investigation is leaving the legal team, a spokesman said Thursday.
The departure of John Dowd, who has led the effort since last summer, comes after the lawyer issued a statement last weekend calling for an end to the special counsel’s probe.
Mr. Dowd declined... RELATED VIDEO What People Really Mean When They Say 'Collusion' When it comes to the Russia investigation, the word "Collusion" gets thrown around a lot. But there's not a lot of clarity on what it actually means. Is it illegal? Is it grounds for impeachment? We asked a law professor to explain. Photo Illustration: Drew Evans/The Wall Street Journal.
